Room.Name: Lafyette's Blacksmithing and Repairs
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Lafyette's foundry, where Lafeyette will fix your weapons.
Room.LongDescription: Lafyette also fixes armors and almost anything else that can be broken. Repairing metals is a costly job, though, and will require quite a bit of gold from you if you want it repaired. If it's too expensive for you, then there's a trash recycling facility in this same complex on the west side of Melbourne Avenue.
